textarea:focus,
input:focus {
	border-color: transparent !important;
}

.mainContainer {
	width: 100%;
	min-height: 100vh;
	display: flex;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	justify-content: center;
	align-items: center;
	padding: 15px;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.formWrap {
	width: 768px;
	background-color: #F3F3F3
		/*#FAFAFA*/
	;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	background-position-x: 0%;
	background-position-y: 0%;

	padding-top: 40px;
	padding-right: 55px;
	padding-bottom: 40px;
	padding-left: 55px;
	margin: 0px;

	border-left: 5px solid #EA9B3E;
}

.inputText {
	height: 45px;
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	background: transparent;
	font-size: 15px;
	color: #3C3734
		/*#fff*/
	;
	line-height: 1.2;
	padding: 0 5px;

	/*colocar para todos os botoes?*/
	outline: none;
	border: none;
	overflow: visible;
	margin: 0;
	touch-action: manipulation;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.inputWithButton {
	display: inline;
	width: 80%;
	/*O VSCode, informa que essa propriedade nao tem efeito aqui, mas parece ter sim, se remove esse parametro o texto ocupa a linha toda*/
}

.inputButton {
	/*Usar essa classe para que um botao fique na mesma linha de um input*/
	display: inline;
}

.inputText:hover {
	border-color: dimgray;
	border-style: solid;
	border-width: 1px;
}

.inputText::placeholder {
	color: #999;
}

.focus-input {
	position: absolute;
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	pointer-events: none;
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
}

.focus-input::before {
	content: "";
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: -2px;
	left: 0;
	width: 0;
	height: 2px;
	transition: all 0.4s;
	background: #3C3734
		/*#fff*/
	;
	box-sizing: inherit;
}

.comboBox {
	height: 45px;
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	background: transparent;
	font-size: 15px;
	color: #3C3734
		/*#fff*/
	;
	line-height: 1.2;
	padding: 0 5px;

	outline: none;
	border: none;
	overflow: visible;
	margin: 0;
	touch-action: manipulation;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.comboBox:hover {
	border-color: dimgray;
	border-style: solid;
	border-width: 1px;
}

/*select option*/
select {
	background: #fff;
	color: #000;
}

.select-default {
	font-family: sans-serif;
	width: 250px;
	height: 300px;
	overflow-x: auto;
}

.select-unique {
	font-family: sans-serif;
	width: 600px;
	height: 450px;
	overflow-x: auto;
}

.option-default {
	clear: both;
	display: inline;
	float: left;
}

.select-default::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
	-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(200, 200, 200, 0.3);
	box-shadow: transparent;
	/*border-radius: 7px;*/
	background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

.select-default::-webkit-scrollbar {
	width: 12px;
	background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

.select-default::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
	/*border-radius: 7px;*/
	-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(200, 200, 200, .3);
	box-shadow: transparent;
	background-color: #A0A0A0;
}

input::-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator {
	background-color: inherit;
}

.wrap-button {
	padding-top: 23px;
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.wrap-submit {
	align-content: center;
	justify-content: center;
}

.btn-submit {

	/*
	font-family: sans-serif;
	font-size: 16px;

	color: white;
	background-color: #3C3734;

	line-height: 1.2;

	color: white;
	background-color: #3C3734;

	line-height: 1.2;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	justify-content: center;
	align-items: center;
	padding: 0 15px;
	/*min-width: 120px;*/
	height: 25px;
	border-radius: 2px;

	outline: none;
	border: 1px solid;
	overflow: visible;
	touch-action: manipulation;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	padding: 4px;

}

.btn-submit:hover {
	color: white;
	background-color: #3C3734;
	border: 2px solid #EA9B3E;
	cursor: pointer;
}

.btn-submit:disabled {
	background-color: #dddddd;
}

.btn-submit:hover:disabled {
	border-style: none;
	cursor: auto;
}
